heading: HB01398
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING A DRUG REHABILITATION CENTER IN THE CITY OF CABADBARAN, PROVINCE OF AGUSAN DEL NORTE, TO BE KNOWN AS THE AGUSAN DEL NORTE REHABILITATION CENTER AND ALLOCATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2016-09-22
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01398
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A DRUG REHABILITATION CENTER IN THE CITY OF CABADBARAN, PROVINCE OF AGUSAN DEL NORTE, TO BE KNOWN AS THE AGUSAN DEL NORTE REHABILITATION CENTER AND ALLOCATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : AMANTE, ERLPE JOHN "PING" M.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-12
SIGNIFICANCE: LOCAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-08-24
          -Referred the measure for comment to the Dangerous Drugs Board and the Department of Health
      2. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2016-09-22
          -Initial Deliberation on Measures calling for the establishment of Rehabilitation Centers
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON DANGEROUS DRUGS ON 2016-08-01
